pkgmetadata.longdescription: Regularized Wasserstein Distances and Barycenters // Computations of Sinkhorn Distances (upper bounds to the Wasserstein Distance a.k.a. Earth Mover's Distance) and Wasserstein Barycenters. Relevant papers are Marco Cuturi (2013) arXiv:1306.0895 and Marco Cuturi (2014) arXiv:1310.4375. To speed up the computation time the main iteration steps are based on 'RcppArmadillo'.
